title: [K-12] Engineering Surveying Project Design Based on Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational surveying theory and trigonometric function comprehension
context.additional_context: Field data collection and collaborative tool usage via smartphone applications

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their logical thinking proficiency levels and develop improvement plans through TOLT-based reasoning assessments
Learners can propose problem-solving solutions applying spatial reasoning and variable control skills during surveying projects
Learners can write reports utilizing error analysis and data interpretation skills in team-based field surveying tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
